trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Aurora
There were no other sightings in Aurora on or around January 10th 2012
Summary: It looked like a cigar or plane with no wings. It was metal light,metal light metal light.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home from work and decided to take Cherry Creek Dam Rd instead of I-225 into Aurora, CO. I was merging onto Parker Road approaching the Hampden exist and noticed in the sky before my turn this object in the sky over Cherry Creek Resevoir. I couldn't take a picture because I was driving and there wasn't any place to really pull over. I noticed that it looked like a plane that was vertical with no wings and had 3 lights on it. I recently watched the movie "The Fourth Kind" and this experience has completely feaked me out!
